channel.title: math.QA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.QA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Birational Equivalences and Generalized Weyl Algebras
item.description: arXiv:2009.14801v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We calculate suitably localized Hochschild homologies of various quantum groups and Podle\'s spheres after realizing them as generalized Weyl algebras (GWAs). We use the fact that every GWA is birationally equivalent to a smash product with a 1-torus. We also address and solve the birational equivalence problem and the birational smoothness problem for GWAs.
item.dc:creator: Atabey Kaygun

item.title: Inflations for representations of shifted quantum affine algebras
item.dc:creator: Th\'eo Pinet
